base_description: Gray rectangular cabinet with drawer and door.
part_description: One top drawer with handle, below a larger door with handle, both centrally positioned on the front of the cabinet.
internal_interaction_description: The drawer slides in and out on rails, while the door swings open on hinges. Both parts have handles for easy access, and the internal space of the cabinet is likely divided for storage purposes.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall or under a countertop. It interacts with users through the handles, allowing for storage and organization of items within a room, such as a kitchen or bathroom.
